title: Instructional video: how to be a Bboy
creator_credit: Graeme Pereira and Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM)
brief_description: This breakdance video featuring Melbourne crew Ghetto Rock uses super slick camera work and multimedia effects to show off a series of breathtaing moves. Fresh.
